item.description: Here's one for our central and western CT friends. Darbar India in Branford has some wonderful food. Please get your RSVPs in so that I can give the restaurant a rough idea of how many people we are expecting!  Please remember to bring enough cash to cover your own food.  We had a problem with one restaurant we went to not being able to do separate checks, and not having to make the server run multiple credit cards makes it a lot easier to sort out the bill.

group.name: Atheist Humanist Society of CT and RI

item.name: Ethnic Food Night #3
